text: Fan zai da dishang wangzizunda zhe, wo jiang shi tamen yuanli wo de jixiang [“gulanjing”]. Jishi tamen kanjian suoyou jixiang, tamen ye bu hui xinyang. Jiaru tamen kanjian zhengdao, tamen ye bu hui ba ta dang zhengdao [zunxing]; jiaru tamen kanjian xiedao, tamen jiu hui ba ta dang zhengdao [zunxing]. Zhe shi yinwei tamen fouren bing hushi wo de jixiang [zhu].
